verses.text: \w Send|strong="H7971"\w* \w forth|strong="H7971"\w*, O Lord, \w the|strong="H0413"\w* lamb, \w the|strong="H0413"\w* \w ruler|strong="H4910"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H0413"\w* \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*, \w from|strong="H0413"\w* Petra \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H0413"\w* \w desert|strong="H4057"\w*, \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0413"\w* \w mount|strong="H2022"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H0413"\w* \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* Sion.

\w And|strong="H7971"\w* \w it|strong="H1961"\w* shall \w come|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w pass|strong="H1961"\w*, \w that|strong="H1961"\w* \w as|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w bird|strong="H5775"\w* \w fleeing|strong="H5074"\w* \w away|strong="H7971"\w*, \w and|strong="H7971"\w* \w as|strong="H1961"\w* young ones flying \w out|strong="H7971"\w* \w of|strong="H1323"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* \w nest|strong="H7064"\w*, \w so|strong="H7971"\w* shall \w the|strong="H1961"\w* \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w* \w of|strong="H1323"\w* \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w in|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* passage \w of|strong="H1323"\w* \w Arnon|strong="H0769"\w*.

\w Take|strong="H0935"\w* \w counsel|strong="H6098"\w*, gather \w a|strong="H0935"\w* council: \w make|strong="H6213"\w* thy \w shadow|strong="H6738"\w* \w as|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H0935"\w* \w night|strong="H3915"\w* \w in|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H0935"\w* midday: \w hide|strong="H5641"\w* \w them|strong="H0935"\w* \w that|strong="H6098"\w* \w flee|strong="H5074"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w betray|strong="H1540"\w* \w not|strong="H0408"\w* \w them|strong="H0935"\w* \w that|strong="H6098"\w* \w wander|strong="H5074"\w* \w about|strong="H0935"\w*.

\w My|strong="H3588"\w* \w fugitives|strong="H5080"\w* \w shall|strong="H0776"\w* \w dwell|strong="H1481"\w* \w with|strong="H0776"\w* thee: O \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w*, \w be|strong="H0776"\w* thou \w a|strong="H3588"\w* covert \w to|strong="H0776"\w* \w them|strong="H6440"\w* \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w face|strong="H6440"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w destroyer|strong="H7703"\w*: \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w dust|strong="H0776"\w* \w is|strong="H0776"\w* \w at|strong="H7703"\w* \w an|strong="H4480"\w* \w end|strong="H3615"\w*, \w the|strong="H6440"\w* wretch \w is|strong="H0776"\w* \w consumed|strong="H3615"\w*: \w he|strong="H3588"\w* hath \w failed|strong="H3615"\w*, \w that|strong="H3588"\w* trod \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w earth|strong="H0776"\w* \w under|strong="H4480"\w* foot.

\w And|strong="H4941"\w* \w a|strong="H5921"\w* \w throne|strong="H3678"\w* \w shall|strong="H3427"\w* \w be|strong="H1732"\w* \w prepared|strong="H3559"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* mercy, \w and|strong="H4941"\w* one \w shall|strong="H3427"\w* \w sit|strong="H3427"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w truth|strong="H0571"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w tabernacle|strong="H0168"\w* \w of|strong="H0168"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w*, \w judging|strong="H8199"\w* \w and|strong="H4941"\w* \w seeking|strong="H1875"\w* \w judgment|strong="H4941"\w* \w and|strong="H4941"\w* quickly rendering \w that|strong="H1732"\w* which \w is|strong="H4941"\w* \w just|strong="H6664"\w*.

\w We|strong="H8085"\w* \w have|strong="H3808"\w* \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* \w of|strong="H8085"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w pride|strong="H1346"\w* \w of|strong="H8085"\w* \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w*, \w he|strong="H3651"\w* \w is|strong="H3651"\w* \w exceeding|strong="H3966"\w* \w proud|strong="H1346"\w*: \w his|strong="H8085"\w* \w pride|strong="H1346"\w* \w and|strong="H8085"\w* \w his|strong="H8085"\w* arrogancy, \w and|strong="H8085"\w* \w his|strong="H8085"\w* indignation \w is|strong="H3651"\w* \w more|strong="H3966"\w* \w than|strong="H3808"\w* \w his|strong="H8085"\w* strength.

\w Therefore|strong="H3651"\w* shall \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w* \w howl|strong="H3213"\w* \w to|strong="H0389"\w* \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w*, \w every|strong="H3605"\w* \w one|strong="H3605"\w* shall \w howl|strong="H3213"\w*: \w to|strong="H0389"\w* them \w that|strong="H3605"\w* rejoice upon \w the|strong="H3605"\w* brick walls, \w tell|strong="H3605"\w* ye \w their|strong="H3605"\w* stripes.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* suburbs \w of|strong="H1167"\w* Hesebon \w are|strong="H1471"\w* desolate, \w and|strong="H1471"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w lords|strong="H1167"\w* \w of|strong="H1167"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w nations|strong="H1471"\w* \w have|strong="H1471"\w* destroyed \w the|strong="H3588"\w* vineyard \w of|strong="H1167"\w* Sabama: \w the|strong="H3588"\w* branches thereof \w have|strong="H1471"\w* \w reached|strong="H5060"\w* \w even|strong="H5704"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w Jazer|strong="H3270"\w*: \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H1471"\w* \w wandered|strong="H8582"\w* \w in|strong="H3220"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w*, \w the|strong="H3588"\w* branches thereof \w are|strong="H1471"\w* \w left|strong="H5203"\w*, \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w are|strong="H1471"\w* \w gone|strong="H8582"\w* \w over|strong="H5674"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w sea|strong="H3220"\w*.

\w Therefore|strong="H3651"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H5307"\w* lament \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w weeping|strong="H1065"\w* \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w Jazer|strong="H3270"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* vineyard \w of|strong="H5921"\w* Sabama: \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H5307"\w* \w water|strong="H7301"\w* thee \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* \w tears|strong="H1832"\w*, O Hesebon, \w and|strong="H5307"\w* Eleale: \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* voice \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* treaders hath rushed \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* thy vintage, \w and|strong="H5307"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* thy \w harvest|strong="H7105"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3196"\w* \w gladness|strong="H8057"\w* \w and|strong="H3196"\w* \w joy|strong="H8057"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w taken|strong="H0622"\w* \w away|strong="H0622"\w* \w from|strong="H4480"\w* Carmel, \w and|strong="H3196"\w* there \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w rejoicing|strong="H8057"\w* \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w shouting|strong="H7321"\w* \w in|strong="H0622"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* \w vineyards|strong="H3754"\w*. \w He|strong="H4480"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w tread|strong="H1869"\w* \w out|strong="H4480"\w* \w wine|strong="H3196"\w* \w in|strong="H0622"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* \w press|strong="H3342"\w* \w that|strong="H4480"\w* \w was|strong="H3808"\w* wont \w to|strong="H4480"\w* \w tread|strong="H1869"\w* \w it|strong="H3808"\w* \w out|strong="H4480"\w*: \w the|strong="H4480"\w* voice \w of|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* treaders \w I|strong="H3808"\w* \w have|strong="H3808"\w* \w taken|strong="H0622"\w* \w away|strong="H0622"\w*.

Wherefore \w my|strong="H5921"\w* \w bowels|strong="H4578"\w* shall sound \w like|strong="H3651"\w* \w a|strong="H5921"\w* \w harp|strong="H3658"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w*, \w and|strong="H3658"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* \w inward|strong="H7130"\w* \w parts|strong="H4578"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* brick wall.

\w And|strong="H0935"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w come|strong="H0935"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w pass|strong="H0935"\w*, \w when|strong="H3588"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w is|strong="H1961"\w* \w seen|strong="H7200"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w* \w is|strong="H1961"\w* \w wearied|strong="H3811"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w high|strong="H1116"\w* \w places|strong="H1116"\w*, \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w go|strong="H0935"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w sanctuaries|strong="H4720"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w pray|strong="H6419"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w prevail|strong="H3201"\w*.

\w This|strong="H2088"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w word|strong="H1697"\w*, \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w spoke|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w* \w from|strong="H0413"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w time|strong="H0227"\w*:

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w now|strong="H6258"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* hath \w spoken|strong="H1696"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*: \w In|strong="H8141"\w* \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w*, \w as|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H1696"\w* hireling, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w glory|strong="H3519"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* taken \w away|strong="H3605"\w* \w for|strong="H3605"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w multitude|strong="H1995"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w people|strong="H1995"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w it|strong="H1696"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w left|strong="H7605"\w* \w small|strong="H4592"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* feeble, \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w many|strong="H7227"\w*.
